import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import diomond from './diomond.png' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import total from './total.png' import mycontext from './Context/Createcontext' function Navbar() { const navigate=useNavigate() const {Note}=useContext(mycontext) const sumOfwork = Note.reduce((sum, currentItem) => sum + currentItem.dailywork, 0); const[sum,setSum]=useState(sumOfwork) const hendleLogout=()=>{ localStorage.removeItem('token') setSum(0) navigate('/login') console.log(sum) } return (
HIRADAYRI

{sumOfwork}

{!localStorage.getItem('token')?
Login Sinup
:}
) } export default Navbar
